meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a grape.
meanings.sent1: The grapey scent of the flowers filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The grapey flavor of the juice was refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: She wore a grapey perfume that made everyone think of vineyards.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a grapey hue, like a giant grape.
meanings.sent5: The grapey color of the dress made her stand out at the party.

meanings.definition: Having the taste or aroma of grapes.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a grapey taste that reminded me of childhood.
meanings.sent2: The wine was so grapey that it transported me to a vineyard.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his grapey breath could turn water into wine.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with a grapey fragrance that made her smile.
meanings.sent5: The grapey jam on the toast was a delightful morning treat.
